heading: Brokerages
subHeading: Connect to the live markets using any of our supported brokerages
content: Brokerages supply a connection to the exchanges so that you can automate orders using LEAN. You can use multiple data providers in live trading algorithms.

featureShortDescription.01: Equities, FOREX, CFD, Crypto, Futures, & Future Options
featureShortDescription.07: Equities, Options, FOREX, Futures, Future Options, & CFD
